game.title: Ancient Temple Quest
game.objective: Discover the hidden artifact in the ancient temple
game.description: Follow the clues scattered throughout the ruins to find the artifact.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the temple
task.description: Search for an unmarked cave entrance near the riverbank.
Uncover the map within the ruins to navigate the temple's maze.
Collect three relics from different chambers to unlock the artifact room.
